## Reviewer Checklist

 - [ ] Do you understand it?
 - [ ] Is it correct?
 - [ ] Is it safe?
 - [ ] Is it legally compliant?
 - [ ] Is it robust?
 - [ ] Is it simple?
 - [ ] Is it tested?
 - [ ] Is it documented?
 - [ ] Is the style consistent?

See [the reviewer guide](docs/reviews.md) for more detail on each check.
